name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: [SOUND] This lecture is about how to

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: evaluate the text retrieval system when

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: we have multiple levels of judgments.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: In this lecture we will continue the discussion of evaluation.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: We're going to look at how to evaluate the text retrieval system.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: And we have multiple level of judgements.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _So
column6: so far we have talked about binding judgements

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: that means a documents is judged as being relevant or not-relevant.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _But earlier we will also talk about
column6: relevance as a matter of degree. _

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _So we often can distinguish it very higher relevant options

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _those are very useful options

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _They are okay

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: And further from non-relevant documents.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: Those are not useful.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: Right?

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: So imagine you can have ratings for these pages.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: Then you would have much more levels of ratings.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _For example
column6: here I show an example of three levels

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _Sorry

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: Two for marginally relevant and one for non-relevant.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: Now how do we evaluate such a new system using these judgements of use of the map

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _doesn't work

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: record doesn't work because they rely on vinyl judgement.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: So let's look at the sum top regular results when using these judgments.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: Right? Imagine the user would be mostly

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: care about the top ten results here.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: Right.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: And we mark the the rating levels or

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: relevance levels for these documents as shown here.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _Three

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: And we call these gain.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _And the reason why we call it a gain

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _we are infusing is called

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _So this gain basically can mesh your

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _information a user can obtain by looking at each document

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: So looking after the first document the user can gain three points.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: Looking at the non-relevant document the user would only gain one point.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: Right. Looking at the multi-level relevant or

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: marginally relevant document the user would get two points et cetera.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: So this gain usually matches the utility of a document from a user's perspective.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _Of course if we assume the user stops at the ten documents

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: we're looking at the cutoff at ten we can look after the total gain of the user.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _And what's that
column6: well that's simply the sum of these and _

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: we call it the cumulative gain.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: So if we use a stops at the positua that's just a three.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: If the user looks at another document that's a 3 plus 2.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: If the user looks at the more documents.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: Then the cumulative gain is more.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _Of course
column6: this is at the cost of spending more time to examine the list. _

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: So cumulative gain gives us some idea about

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: how much total gain the user would have if the user examines all these documents.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _Now
column7: we also have another letter here

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: So why do we want to do discounting?

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _Well
column6: if you look at this cumulative gain
column7: there is one deficiency which is _

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: it did not consider the rank position of these these documents.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _So

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _and we only know there is only one highly relevant document

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _one marginally relevant document

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: We don't really care where they are ranked.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _Ideally
column6: we want these two to be ranked on the top. _

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: Which is the case here.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: But how can we capture that intuition?

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _Well we have to say
column6: well this 3 here is not as good as this 3 on the top. _

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _And that means the contribution of

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _the game from different positions
column6: has to be weight by their position. _

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _And this is the idea of discounting

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _So
column9: doesn't it need to be discounted _

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _because the user can be assume that you always see this document

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _the second one
column6: this one will be discounted a little bit

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: because there's a small possibility that the user wouldn't notice it.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _So
column6: we divide this gain by the weight

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _So
column7: two is the rank position of this document and

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _when we go to the third position

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _discount even more because the numbers is log of three
column6: and so on and so forth. _

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: So when we take a such a sum then a lowly ranked document would not contribute

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: contribute that much as a highly ranked document.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _So that means if you
column7: switch the position of this and let's say _

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _this position and this one
column6: and then you would get more discount if you put _

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _for example
column6: very relevant document here as opposed to two here. _

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _Imagine if you put the three here
column6: then it would have to be discounted. _

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: So it's not as good as if you would put the three here.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: So this is the idea of discounting.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _Okay
column7: now at this point that we have got this discounted cumulative gain for _

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: measuring the utility of this ranked list with multiple levels of judgments.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: So are we happy with this?

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: Well we can use this rank systems.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: Now we still need to do a little bit more in order to

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: make this measure comfortable across different topics.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: And this is the last step.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _And by the way
column6: here we just show that DCG at the ten. _

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: Alright.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: So this is the total sum of DCG over all these ten documents.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _So the last step is called N

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: And if we do that then we get normalized DCG.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: So how do we do that?

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _Well
column6: the idea here is within the Normalized DCG _

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: by the Ideal DCG at the same cutoff.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: What is the Ideal DCG?

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: Well this is a DCG of ideal ranking.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: So imagine if we have nine documents in the whole collection

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: rated a three here and that means in total we have nine documents rated three.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _Then

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: would have put all these nine documents on the very top.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _So all these would have to be three and then this would be followed by a two here

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: because that's the best we could do after we have run out of threes.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: But all these positions would be threes.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: Right?

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: So this would be our ideal ranked list.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: And then we can compute the DCG for this ideal rank list.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _So this would be given by this formula you see here

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: this idea DCG would be used as the normalizer DCG.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _Like so here
column6: and this IdealDCG would be used as a normalizer. _

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: So you can imagine now normalization essentially is to compare the actual DCG

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: with the best decision you can possibly get for this topic.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: Now why do we want to do this?

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _Well by doing this we'll map the DCG values in to a range of zero through one

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _so the best value
column6: or the highest value for every query would be one. _

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: That's when you're relevance is in fact the idealist.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: But otherwise in general you will be lower than one.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: Now what if we don't do that?

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _Well
column6: you can see this transformation or this numberization

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: doesn't really affect the relative comparison of systems for

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _just one topic
column6: because this ideal DCG is the same for all the systems. _

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: So the ranking of systems based on only DCG would be exactly the same.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: As if you rank them based on the normalized decision.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: The difference however is when we have multiple topics because

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _if we don't do normalization
column6: different topics will have different scales of DCG. _

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: For a topic like this one we have nine highly relevant documents.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: The DCG can get really high.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: But imagine that in another case there are only two very relevant documents.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: In total in the whole collection.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: Then the highest DCG that any system could achieve for

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: such a topic would not be very high.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: So again we face the problem of different scales of DCG values and when we

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: take an average we don't want the average to be dominated by those high values.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: Those are again easy quires.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _So by doing the normalization we have all

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: Making all the purists contribute equal to the average.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: So this is the idea of NDCG.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: It's used for measuring relevance based on much more level relevance judgments.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _So more in the more general way

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: this is basically a measure that can be applied through

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _any ranked task with much more level of

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: And the scale of the judgments can be multiple

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _can be more than binary

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _like one's or five
column6: or even more depending on your application. _

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _And the main idea of this measure just to summarize

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: is to measure the total utility of the top k documents.

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _So you always choose a cutoff
column6: and then you measure the total utility. _

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _And it would discount the contribution from a lowly ranked document

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: _and finally
column6: it would do normalization to ensure comparability across queries _

name: 3 - 8 - 2.7 Evaluation of TR Systems- Multi-Level Judgements (00-10-48).srt
text: [MUSIC]
